name: Honk Loves Maki
description:
This is a deliberately terrible (and yet, somehow, terrible in ways that weren't deliberate) Love Live! fan VN.

Back in 2015, two friends of mine made "a shitpost in visual novel form" called Uminico: When They Smile. Thus inspired, I downloaded Ren'Py myself with the intention of making a serious Honkmaki fic-as-VN. Instead, I got about two lines of dialogue written and ran with it into shitpost territory. Though to call this a shitpost is probably a gross insult to shitposts.

Anyway, for completeness' sake, and as a counterpoint to my upcoming (and vastly improved) shitpost visual novel, Fairy Godmari, I'm uploading this here, though if I had any sense I'd probably let it rot.
